name: Broadsword Technology Group
overview: Broadsword Technology (BST) Limited trading as Accendo Technologies provides professional services for clients in the IT industry. It also develops customer experience management solutions for the global mobile market. The companyâ€™s design and development services include designing embedded and DSP software, application software, test solutions, and near shore modular design solutions, as well as providing design reviews and project rescue, reverse and re-engineering, digital design, onsite contractors w/wo project managers, and off shore project management and technical collaboration for telecommunications, advanced consumer products, and real time embedded solutions. It offers manufacturing intelligence services to medical devices and precision electronics, as well as printing, labels, and packaging sectors. The companyâ€™s business solutions include business intelligence and business process management. It also offers staffing solutions, such as virtual staffing, nearshore and offshore development, and recruitment. The company has sales partners in the United Kingdom, the United States, and Australia. Broadsword Technology (BST) Limited was founded in 2002 and is based in Limerick, Ireland with additional offices in Ireland.

acquisition.source_description: Paratek Acquires BST Technology Group From Gennum Corporation
